text:
Trying to write a DF to a file, but coming across this,

```julia> CSV.write("file.txt", df)
ERROR: MethodError: no method matching length(::Symbol)```
Is there another simple way of doing this?

elements.text: Trying to write a DF to a file, but coming across this,

julia> CSV.write("file.txt", df)

text: Do you have a column of symbols? Is that where the error is coming from?

elements.text: Do you have a column of symbols? Is that where the error is coming from?

text: Trying to debug this for someone who’s not in this Slack. But I assume so, yes.

text: Hmmmm, it works for me locally; just writing a DataFrame w/ one column of all symbols. I'd double check they're not on an old version, since I think that was an issue a long time ago.

text:
Yeah I just checked that and it seems fine. Problem is this df is an entire DB table dump, so it’s not as easy to cruise through.
Might just ask them to convert what they did in the REPL, tee it into a file and call it there.
